bibl.title: Apotympanismos. Biblia grecka, papirusy i prawo karne ptolemejskiego Egiptu. Avec résumé en anglais: Apotympanismus in the Greek Bible, in Papyri and in the Penal Law of Ptolemaic Egypt.
bibl.note: Discusses apotympanismus - a method of execution, known from Athens in the 5th cent. B.C. This punishment is mentioned, directly or indirectly, in the Third Book of Maccabees and in various sources concerning Egypt under Ptolemaic rule.

Discusses apotympanismus - a method of execution, known from Athens in the 5th cent. B.C. This punishment is mentioned, directly or indirectly, in the Third Book of Maccabees and in various sources concerning Egypt under Ptolemaic rule.
